attributes.action: Preserve BBC Television Centre, Shepherd's Bush
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC will be downsizing it's operations at BBC Television Centre, Wood Lane, London W12 7RJ. As a result, the site will be underused and the building may well be demolished. This eye-catching building should be preserved for the nation, as it is an important part of our cultural heritage.

We ask that BBC Television Centre get grade 1 listed building status.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Preserve BBC Television Centre, Shepherd's Bush."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14753.asp

Prime Minister's Office
